title: Ferguson not ruling out return to management
summary: Barry Ferguson would "never rule out going back into management" and says he has already had "a few offers" since his spell as Rangers' interim head coach came to an end this summer.

title: The Wafcon star who is also a doctor
summary: Morocco midfielder Salma Bouguerche says medicine "chose her" as a career, having qualified as a doctor last year.

title: You can never write England off - Kirby
summary: Former England forward Fran Kirby tells BBC Sport's Katie Gornall that you can "never write England off", speaking before their Euro 2025 semi-final against Italy.
